docs.text: Experiments and Results Detailed Results This table shows the detailed results for each adaptive GR system, performing in different problem instances under three types of environmental drift. The selected problem instances all have significant environmental changes. drift : the type of environmental changes domain : the domain of the agent acting in system : a GR system (adaptive or conventional) problem : a specific problem instance in a domain 1 - 50 : the average accuracy for a GR system performing from timestep 1 to timestep 50 51 - 100 : the average accuracy for a GR system performing from timestep 51 to timestep 100 101 - 150 : the average accuracy for a GR system performing from timestep 101 to timestep 150 151 - 200 : the average accuracy for a GR system performing from timestep 151 to timestep 200 The environment changes after every 50 timesteps, either suddenly or gradually. If there are no GR tasks during a particular period, the value nan is used. drift domain system problem 1 - 50 51 - 100 101 - 150 151 - 200 reoccurring satellite no relearn p01 0.699 0.494 0.670 0.505 docs.title: Home

docs.text: This table shows the detailed results for each adaptive GR system, performing in different problem instances under three types of environmental drift. The selected problem instances all have significant environmental changes. drift : the type of environmental changes domain : the domain of the agent acting in system : a GR system (adaptive or conventional) problem : a specific problem instance in a domain 1 - 50 : the average accuracy for a GR system performing from timestep 1 to timestep 50 51 - 100 : the average accuracy for a GR system performing from timestep 51 to timestep 100 101 - 150 : the average accuracy for a GR system performing from timestep 101 to timestep 150 151 - 200 : the average accuracy for a GR system performing from timestep 151 to timestep 200 The environment changes after every 50 timesteps, either suddenly or gradually. If there are no GR tasks during a particular period, the value nan is used. drift domain system problem 1 - 50 51 - 100 101 - 150 151 - 200 reoccurring satellite no relearn p01 0.699 0.494 0.670 0.505
